snippet.title: First Look at New Top-down Tactical Shooter | Project ARC
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3143710/Project_ARC/

Check out our first-ever reveal of Project ARC, a 5v5 PvP shooter with immersive gunplay. 
(*This content has been made with a development build. Final version may vary.)

We are a small team in PUBG Studios and we are yet to open our game to the public, but keep us on the radar if you'd like to experience a realistic, skill-based, and thrilling gunfights like never before in a top-down shooter.  

▶ Wishlist on Steam and follow us for updates!

Keep up to date with our progress in our official Project ARC channels! And don't forget to join our community.

Follow us for more:👇
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3143710/Project_ARC/
Discord: https://discord.gg/7NqJP8mkWU
X: https://x.com/PUBGARCteam
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@projectarc_

#ProjectARC #KRAFTON #PUBG #topdown #gaming
